channel.title: Awesome kq?
channel.description: ok i want in my server where there r the 3 kq's. how would i make it so that once u kill the first form the second pops ups? then after the second its the 3rd? and then once the 3rd dies u get yer prize. how would i beable to do that?

item.title: Awesome kq?

item.description:

I don’t know how exactly but here’s an idea: Instead of setting an NPC drop, set a new NPC spawn if conditons meet true for the KQ form 1 being applied dead.

I’m guessing NPCHandler.
